resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105806</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105806</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204178</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">USGS Educational Resources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">USGS Pädagogische Betriebsmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources Éducatives d'USGS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos Educacionais de USGS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse Educative di USGS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπαιδευτικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς USGS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos Educativos de USGS</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The mission of the U.S. Geological Survey's Education Program is to educate and inform data users in the use and application of USGS products and services. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Mission der VEREINIGTE STAATEN geologischen 
des Programms Ausbildung Übersicht ist, Datenbenutzer im Gebrauch und
in der Anwendung von USGS Produkten und Dienstleistungen zu erziehen 
und zu informieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mission du programme de l'éducation de 
l'enquête géologique des ETATS-UNIS est d'instruire et informer des 
utilisateurs de données dans l'utilisation et l'application des 
produits et des services d'USGS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A missão do programa da instrução do exame 
geological de ESTADOS UNIDOS é educar e informar usuários dos dados 
no uso e na aplicação de produtos e de serviços de USGS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La missione del programma di formazione 
dell'indagine geologica degli STATI UNITI è di istruire ed informare 
gli utenti di dati nell'uso e nell'applicazione dei prodotti e dei 
servizi di USGS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αποστολή του προγράμματος εκπαίδευσης της 
ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΗΣ γεωλογικής έρευνας είναι να εκπαιδευτούν και να 
ενημερωθούν οι χρήστες στοιχείων στη χρήση και την αίτηση των 
προϊόντων USGS και των υπηρεσιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La misión del programa de la educación de la 
encuesta sobre geológica ESTADOS UNIDOS es educar e informar a 
utilizadores de los datos en el uso y la aplicación de los productos 
y de los servicios de USGS.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JAMIE MCBETH
FN:JAMIE MCBETH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:USGS
FN:USGS
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204178</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105806</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/usgs-educational-resources</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
